column2: caption=Belba Baggins from [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)

column1: Belba was the eldest daughter, and second-oldest child, of [[Mungo Baggins]] and [[Laura Grubb]]. This made her the aunt of [[Bilbo Baggins
column2: Bilbo]]. She married [[Rudigar Bolger]], and they had one child together, [[Herugar Bolger

column1: :Five portraits are clustered on a wall in [[Bag End]]. One of them is Belba, and one of Bilbo's lines when looking at the portraits is "That's my Aunt Belba".
